trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Augusta
There was one other sighting in Augusta on or around December 17th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 6:41 i was in my car with my girlfriend leaving Augesta tec when we both saw four amber light. The lights appered all at the same time and they got brighter and moved apart from each other and then disappered. Then the four lights appered agian and did the same thing agian but in a different part of the ski. I was so shocked i almost crashed so i pulled over and called the sherrif's dept. There was no sound that i could hear
Summary: Four bright lights in the ski.
